biotools.summary: Scores RNA hairpin and internal loop sequences against motif groups from the RNA 3D Motif Atlas, by exact sequence match for sequences already observed in 3D and by probabilistic scoring and edit distance for novel sequences.

bioschemas.name: JAR3D
bioschemas.summary: Scores RNA hairpin and internal loop sequences against motif groups from the RNA 3D Motif Atlas, by exact sequence match for sequences already observed in 3D and by probabilistic scoring and edit distance for novel sequences.
